Adriaan Hermanus Diedericks (amụrụ na 1 Nọvemba 1990, Cape Town, South Afrịka) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Afrịka
A maara ya maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ọla nchara ya nke oge a.

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch n'afọ 2012, ọ mụtara Lionel Smit site na 2013 ruo 2014. Diedericks bụ SASOL New Signatures Finalist na 2010 na 2014 na PPC YCSA Finalist na 2013. N'afọ 2014, a kpọrọ Diedericks ka ọ sonye na Art Fair Strasbourg na Cologne.
E gosipụtara ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gụnyere SA Art Times, Top Billing, Effe O' Arte, Visi, Die Burger, Country Life, Ubi Bene na SLOW Magazine
Diedericks mepere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọla nchara na 2016 na Strand, South Afrịka.
N'afọ 2017, Diedericks gara nnọkọ nke anọ nke International Artist Symposium ya na ndị omenkà 9 ndị ọzọ si gburugburu ụwa na Museum Villa Böhm na Germany ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na sandstone na nke mbụ ya.
Diedericks tinyere nnukwu ihe ọkpụkpụ ọha na eze na Stellenbosch, Hermanus, Franschhoek na Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany

Ọrụ Diedericks na-egosipụta ụdị ihe ọkpụkpụ nke Gris oge ochie, na mmezi nke oge a. N'iji akụkọ ifo oge ochie, nke Afrịka na nke Europe, Diedericks na-agụnye ihe osise nke ụmụ nwoke, ịnyịnya na ụgbọ mmiri
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Michel Foucault's Theory of Power na dialectic nke nna ukwu na ohu Hegel.
